entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
